__e: Tell me where the runabout pads are.
Someone on that shuttle really knows what they're doing.
On that subject there's only one shuttle out there.
How did you get your hands on a Federation runabout?
All depends on how you look at it. We found her, but she ran. She took a university shuttle craft.
Let's see what we can do about that shuttle.
That's what you planned to do all along, isn't it? You knew the data rod wouldn't hold up to scrutiny. You just wanted to get him on the station so that you could plant a bomb on his shuttle!
He's on his way to see you - something to do with the shuttle.
The stakes are too high to send a shuttle.
So get on that shuttle and don't look back.
You're going to take a shuttle down and do a little scouting.
If we don't take them out, they will use them to destroy the shuttle and prevent our escape.
Rendezvous with the shuttle in one hour and ten minutes.
